verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's much testing, much testing,
Much testing, much testing,
But oh it's worth it all.
There's much testing, much testing,
Much testing, much testing,
But oh it's worth it all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's worth it all that I might be set free,
It's worth it all that I might praise His holy name,
It's worth it all to see the life coming forth,
It's worth it all; it's worth it all; it's worth it all.
